name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost Editor -Right Click in SM Post Text Box

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your Chrome extension to copy text from Social Media Post textbox and Boost in Boost Editor

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simply right-click on your favourite social media platform to continue editing in Boost Editor (https://boosteditor.com). By selecting the "Edit in Boost Editor" button, you can continue editing your post without losing any previously typed content. The Chrome extension will automatically copy and paste your text into the AI-powered Boost Editor for a smooth editing experience to boost your social media game.

Boost Editor is an AI powered Unicode Text Editor that lets you easily create your social media content and format the text, add fancy fonts and a whole lot more!

Boost Editor Empowers You to Stand Out from the Crowd and make a Lasting Impact ...
BoostEditor allows you to break free from the limitations of social media platforms like LinkedIn, Twitter, or Facebook. Now, you can effortlessly add style to your posts by using 𝗯𝗼𝗹𝗱, 𝐼𝑡𝑎𝑙𝑖𝑐, and u̲n̲d̲e̲r̲l̲i̲n̲e̲ text, along with thousands of eye-catching 𝓕𝓸𝓷𝓽𝓼, Emojis 😀 , AI powered Emoji Selection and Hashtag Generator, all available within a powerful Unicode text editor.

Boost Editor is the best 𝓕𝓪𝓷𝓬𝔂 Font Generator...
Boost Editor offers a seamless and user-friendly experience, making it the ultimate choice for transforming your plain text into captivating and stylish content, guaranteed to leave a lasting impression.
